mapper.sql: spea.RID, spea.EVENT_SOURCE, spea.CLIENTNAME, spea.REPORT_CITY, spea.REPORT_TIME, spea.OCCUR_TIME, spea.EVENT_TYPE1, spea.EVENT_TYPE2, spea.THREAT_LEVEL, spea.THREAT_NAME, spea.THREAT_TYPE1, spea.THREAT_TYPE2, spea.THREAT_TYPE3, spea.THREAT_TYPE4, spea.ATTACK_IP, spea.CC_DOMAIN, spea.CC_URL, spea.IP, spea.DOMAIN, spea.URL, spea.UNIT_INDUSTY, spea.UNIT_NAME, spea.ACCESS_ID, spea.ROOM_NAME, spea.ROOM_IDX, spea.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, spea.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, spea.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, spea.IS_WHITE_LIST, spea.FORCE_CLOSE_DESCE, spea.RECTIFY_TERM, spea.CLOSE_TERM, spea.SEND_TIME, spea.SEND_TIMESTAMP, spea.RECTIFY_STATE, spea.RECTIFY_MEASURE, spea.FEEDBACK_TIME, spea.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, spea.WEB_CASE_RID, spea.MEMO, spea.LOG_TABLENAME, spea.LOG_RID, spea.CREATTIME, spea.MODIFIEDTIME, spea.RECORDSTATE, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME, sal.EVENT_CONTENT, sal.SOLUTION

spea.RID, spea.EVENT_SOURCE, spea.CLIENTNAME, spea.REPORT_CITY, spea.REPORT_TIME, spea.OCCUR_TIME, spea.EVENT_TYPE1, spea.EVENT_TYPE2, spea.THREAT_LEVEL, spea.THREAT_NAME, spea.THREAT_TYPE1, spea.THREAT_TYPE2, spea.THREAT_TYPE3, spea.THREAT_TYPE4, spea.ATTACK_IP, spea.CC_DOMAIN, spea.CC_URL, spea.IP, spea.DOMAIN, spea.URL, spea.UNIT_INDUSTY, spea.UNIT_NAME, spea.ACCESS_ID, spea.ROOM_NAME, spea.ROOM_IDX, spea.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, spea.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, spea.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, spea.IS_WHITE_LIST, spea.FORCE_CLOSE_DESCE, spea.RECTIFY_TERM, spea.CLOSE_TERM, spea.SEND_TIME, spea.SEND_TIMESTAMP, spea.RECTIFY_STATE, spea.RECTIFY_MEASURE, spea.FEEDBACK_TIME, spea.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, spea.WEB_CASE_RID, spea.MEMO, spea.SNAPSHOP, spea.LOG_TABLENAME, spea.LOG_RID, spea.CREATTIME, spea.MODIFIEDTIME, spea.RECORDSTATE, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME, sal.EVENT_CONTENT, sal.SOLUTION
mapper.select: select ,sii.IDC_NAME AS TRANS_IDC_ID,ssw.WEBSITE_NAME as TRANS_WEB_CASE_RID from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as spea left join smms_idc_info as sii on spea.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on spea.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID left join SMMS_AF_LOG as sal on spea.LOG_RID=sal.RID where spea.RECORDSTATE='0' and spea.RID = #{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_PENDING_EVENT set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert: insert into SMMS_PENDING_EVENT ( RID, EVENT_SOURCE, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, REPORT_TIME, OCCUR_TIME, EVENT_TYPE1, EVENT_TYPE2, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ATTACK_IP, CC_DOMAIN, CC_URL, IP, DOMAIN, URL, UNIT_INDUSTY, UNIT_NAME, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, FORCE_CLOSE_DESCE, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, WEB_CASE_RID, MEMO, SNAPSHOP, LOG_TABLENAME, LOG_RID, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE) values ( #{RID}, #{EVENT_SOURCE}, #{CLIENTNAME}, #{REPORT_CITY}, #{REPORT_TIME}, #{OCCUR_TIME}, #{EVENT_TYPE1}, #{EVENT_TYPE2}, #{THREAT_LEVEL}, #{THREAT_NAME}, #{THREAT_TYPE1}, #{THREAT_TYPE2}, #{THREAT_TYPE3}, #{THREAT_TYPE4}, #{ATTACK_IP}, #{CC_DOMAIN}, #{CC_URL}, #{IP}, #{DOMAIN}, #{URL}, #{UNIT_INDUSTY}, #{UNIT_NAME}, #{ACCESS_ID}, #{ROOM_NAME}, #{ROOM_IDX}, #{SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{IS_FORCE_CLOSE}, #{IS_WHITE_LIST}, #{FORCE_CLOSE_DESCE}, #{RECTIFY_TERM}, #{CLOSE_TERM}, #{SEND_TIME}, #{SEND_TIMESTAMP}, #{RECTIFY_STATE}, #{RECTIFY_MEASURE}, #{FEEDBACK_TIME}, #{FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP}, #{WEB_CASE_RID}, #{MEMO}, #{SNAPSHOP}, #{LOG_TABLENAME}, #{LOG_RID}, #{CREATTIME}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{RECORDSTATE})
